output:
I hear voices too. They tell me to do stuff like stay home from school, watch TV and like
break stuff and like...
Sometimes voices tell me to do other stuff, like even cooler stuff. Like this voice, maybe
they're going to get a gum wrapper and like roll it up into a cone and like stick it in
the front of a big old work bike and like fly straight up. Like it keeps going up and
it can't come down, it can't fly anywhere else and it keeps going up until it dies of
exhaustion and then it falls down.
